Calculate proportion of UD that lies within polygon(s)

Source: R/functions_fpudoverlap.R
fpudoverlap.Rd

Calculate proportion of UD that lies within polygon(s)

Usage

fpudoverlap(fppolys, udmap)

Arguments

fppolys

Footprint(s): a simple feature collection

udmap

A utilisation distribution: NOTE: values must sum to approximately one, but not currently checked

Value

Proportion of UD overlapping a polygon: a single numeric value

On this page
